<script>
(function() {
  function resolveItems() {
    var listing =
      window['quarto-listings'] && window['quarto-listings']['listing-notes-listing'];
    if (listing && listing.list && listing.list.items) {
      var items = listing.list.items.map(function(item) { return item.elm; }).filter(Boolean);
      if (items.length) return items;
    }
    var listContainer = document.querySelector('#listing-notes-listing .list');
    if (listContainer) {
      var gridItems = listContainer.querySelectorAll('[data-index], .listing-item, .list-item, .quarto-post');
      if (gridItems.length) return Array.prototype.slice.call(gridItems);
    }
    return [];
  }

  function getLatestDate(items) {
    for (var i = 0; i < items.length; i++) {
      var dateEl = items[i].querySelector('.listing-date') || items[i].querySelector('time');
      if (dateEl && dateEl.textContent.trim()) {
        return dateEl.textContent.trim();
      }
      var dataDate = items[i].getAttribute('data-date') || items[i].getAttribute('data-listing-date-sort');
      if (dataDate) {
        var timestamp = parseInt(dataDate, 10);
        if (!isNaN(timestamp)) {
          var date = new Date(timestamp);
          if (!isNaN(date.getTime())) {
            return date.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'short', day: 'numeric' });
          }
        }
        return dataDate;
      }
    }
    return '-';
  }

  function updateStats() {
    var items = resolveItems();
    var countEl = document.getElementById('notes-count');
    if (countEl) countEl.textContent = items.length || '0';

    var latestEl = document.getElementById('notes-latest-date');
    var latest = getLatestDate(items);
    if (latestEl) latestEl.textContent = latest || '-';

    var emptyEl = document.getElementById('notes-empty');
    if (emptyEl) emptyEl.style.display = items.length ? 'none' : 'block';
  }

  function watchListing() {
    var container = document.getElementById('listing-notes-listing');
    if (!container || !window.MutationObserver) return;
    var observer = new MutationObserver(function() { updateStats(); });
    observer.observe(container, { childList: true, subtree: true });
  }

  function hookListingLoaded() {
    var original = window['quarto-listing-loaded'];
    window['quarto-listing-loaded'] = function() {
      if (typeof original === 'function') original();
      updateStats();
    };
  }

  function init() {
    hookListingLoaded();
    updateStats();
    watchListing();
  }

  if (document.readyState === 'complete') {
    setTimeout(init, 0);
  } else {
    window.addEventListener('load', function() { setTimeout(init, 0); });
  }
})();
</script>
